original_text: She crieth in the chief place of concourse, in the openings of the gates: in the city she uttereth her words, saying,
korean_text: 시끄러운 길목에서 소리를 지르며 성문 어귀와 성중에서 그 소리를 발하여 이르되

sentences.original_text: She crieth in the chief place of concourse
in the openings of the gates
in the city she uttereth her words
